system.description: The character specializes in capturing enemies alive through the use of non-lethal techniques and specialized weapons.
system.benefit: When Character makes a Called Shot against an enemy, they can reduce the damage they inflict after reduction from target's Armour and Toughness by up to a number equal to their Perception Bonus, and inflict a level of Fatigue for each point of damage reduced in this way. Additionally, Attacks the character makes with Shocking Weapons gain no bonuses to resist from armour, and all attacks with Snare weapons suffer an additional -10 to avoid or escape the snaring effect. Note: Later versions of the game don't have armour affect shocking test. So instead, let's say this talent applies an additional -10 to resist Shocking Weapons.

specialAbilities.name: Non-Lethal Takedown
specialAbilities.description: On Called Shots, reduce damage (after armor/toughness) by up to Perception Bonus, inflicting 1 Fatigue per damage reduced.

specialAbilities.name: Enhanced Stunning
specialAbilities.description: Shocking weapons impose -10 additional penalty to resist. Snare weapons impose -10 additional penalty to escape.
